description:
Osomatsu and his brothers don`t try any harder to get jobs and continue to live with their parents. However, their parents suddenly say they`re getting a divorce and are going to sell the house. Then Osomatsu is invited to his beloved Totoko-chan`s room. He knows he probably shouldn`t get his hopes up, but he definitly didn`t expect what followed...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jiritsu Shiyou / Totoko na no Da
Let`s Become Independent / This Is Totoko
自立しよう / トト子なのだ
